title: pittanaip-pOla nAn
sahitya:
pittanaip-pOla nAn cittam kalangiyE pidaTri alaigirEn nidamun pEraiyE


anupallavi

  bhaktiyum jnAnamum pazhudillAk-karmamum paramapada nilaiyum harinAmajapamenrE


caraNam    dAnamum dharmamum tavayOga marmamum sAdhana sAdhyamum sAdhu sanga sukhamum
vAnamum bhUmiyum tAnena nirainda nI manadu vaittAlE varum enadu muyarcciyinrip-
